text: the greatest gift that I could give to
somebody is to write a song for them and
of course I was going to write a song
for antonette because we started dating
and we started to fall in love with each
other and I knew that I was going to be
leaving in a couple of months and I
wanted to give antonette this gift
before I left I just cry like a child
from off in the wings in the gleam of
the spotlight moon you appear to glow
with color we met in yoga class it was
my end of my freshman year of college so
I guess it was the end of your junior
year right I always made sure that my
yoga mat was next to hers and we would
start class um laying down in the dead
body pose and he was the cute guy who
welcomed you up after that posture cuz I
always fell asleep and then what
happened was is I had a fraternity
formal coming up in the spring and I
thought who should i take i should
definitely take that cute girl in yoga
class and we had just this wonderful
wild fun night after time and then after
that it was the end of the year can we
sort of lost touch she very thankfully i
gave me another chance to see her in the
fall and we went out we started to see
each other have dinner and we sort of
just very naturally began to spend a lot
of time with each other yeah so this is
our first scrapbook I've been
documenting our whole relationship in
these in these scrapbooks we had an
amazing beginning and I think because we
knew that I was leaving and graduating
we it became even that much more
precious to us it was a really really
special time we celebrated our monthly
anniversaries which is really fun really
geeky and um we were doing a show
together then it was a student written
show and a friend of ours had written
this beautiful song for two dancers and
antonette was one of the dancers and she
choreographed the piece also and I was
off in the wings watching her dance
peace and I remember it felt like I was
falling in love watching her dance this
piece and it was such a special
experience for me that I knew that I
wanted to write about that in the song
that I was writing for her so actually
the first verse of the song that I wrote
for internet is basically me telling the
story of having that experience of being
off in the wings and watching her dance
and you flow through the air somebody
sings as the two violins make love it
was the fall of last year I woke up and
I and I thought to myself it's
definitely time for us to get engaged
even though we were apart antonette was
on tour I was off doing all sorts of
gigs that year so I had to pick a
weekend that we were going to be in the
same place and we each had christmas eve
and christmas day off so we met in the
city for christmas and i had i got in a
little a few hours earlier and I
decorated the place for Christmas I walk
into the apartment the apartments all
decorated he says get dressed there's a
town car coming at two o'clock um and
I'm taking you to see The Nutcracker we
watched the ballet and it was incredible
as it always is and then we had a very
romantic dinner we drank some champagne
we came home we put on our pajamas and
Jeremy turned on some music a CD
actually of our music and one of the
first songs to come on was the song that
he wrote me I said sit down relax so she
sat down on the couch and closed her
eyes and was listening to the music and
when she opened her eyes I was on one
knee with the ring box he had a bunch of
beautiful things to say to me and I
didn't hear any of them because I was
just so shocked and so excited and so I
made him repeat it all over again I
think your proposed you know at least
four or five times because you know what
happened so fast
the denser I adore
